explains: adj. 有希望的，潜在的； 可能发生的，预期的
wordGroup: prospective study 前瞻研究；预期研究；远景调查
prospective student 未来学生；欲申请的学生

sentences.en: A prospective premium of about 30 percent on their initial investment is enticing.
sentences.cn: 初始投资30％左右的预期收益是诱人的。

sentences.en: I think I told you that we ask prospective reporters to turn in some outlines for articles .
sentences.cn: 我想我告诉过你，我们要求未来的记者们上交几篇文章的提纲。

sentences.en: I think they're really useful for making contact with careers development staff and prospective candidates.
sentences.cn: 我认为它们在联系职业发展人员和潜在的候选人时非常有用。
